text: Dr Shim is a great doctor! Friendly, happy and an extremely patient doctor. I did my yellow fever vaccination with him. Love his professionalism! Definitely recommend him! ☺️ Thank you Dr shim!

Visited on 21/11/19 for the first time due to the good reviews online. To my horror, the doctor was extremely rude and sarcastic when I tried to clarify on my condition. He was also impatient and did not adequetly explain my condition to me. Felt humiliated when I probed more about the treatment and condition. I believe that a good and sincere doctor would not have treated his patients like he did. It was an unpleasant experience and i would definitely not recommend this doctor to anyone.

* Reply to response from Clinic

Hi Jonathan Chu,

Thank you for your email.

I am delighted to witness your incredible dedication to feedback and commitment to improve yourselves.

I chose not to reply you as I do not see a reason to and im sure Doctor Shim himself knows what happened. However, in the event that he does not, he could always refer to the feedback on Google for a refresher. That is unless he does to this everyone and cannot remember which particular patient I was.

I find it extremely comical that you brought up your suspicion of impersonation and identity theft. Your accusations and assumptions are as ridiculous as the service I received from Doctor Shim that day. That said if need be, please seek help from authorities should you suspect that I have impersonated someone when I literally gave you my Identification card. There should be no problem for you to find me, since for some reason your clinic keeps my Identification Card for registration till the point that I see the doctor without explanation given to me.

Lastly, calling the same person asking for the same thing isn't going to change anything. Clearly you have called the wrong person either because you couldn't read the numbers I've wrote or I've written it wrongly. The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting a different result. I pity the guy you called for having to deal with your nonsense, thrice.

Please for the love of God, do not contact me anymore. I would greatly appreciate it.

Regards,
Clinton
Went there for consultation yesterday. The doctor was very friendly and helpful throughout the consultation. He also recommended what was best for me and my partner. A very good experience.
Doctor and his treatment are very good. I am very happy. I want to see him again.

I went there when my STD test result is out to meet doctor for my resul, however during the consultation doctor are impatient and frown when i trying to ask more to clarify my situation, just because i got zero knowledge about it and he even hard sell me to take vaccine with intimidating kind of way to convince me. Not recommended.
